directions: Cook bacon and onion in large skillet on medium-high heat until bacon is crisp.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can navy beans, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup Boston lager beer, such as Samuel Adams®
1 (1.25 ounce) package McCormick® Tex-Mex Chili Seasoning Mix
title: Boston Baked Bean Dip
